original_text: The person that I had asked told me this: “The fourth animal shows that there will be a fourth kingdom on the earth. It will be different from all the other kingdoms. It will use its power to destroy the whole earth. It will stamp on everything and break them into pieces. The person that I had asked told me this: “The fourth animal shows that there will be a fourth kingdom on the earth. It will be different from all the other kingdoms. It will use its power to destroy the whole earth. It will stamp on everything and break them into pieces.
korean_text: 모신 자가 이처럼 이르되 넷째 짐승은 곧 땅의 넷째 나라인데 이는 다른 나라들과는 달라서 온 천하를 삼키고 밟아 부서뜨릴 것이며

sentences.original_text: The person that I had asked told me this:
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 물었던 사람이 내게 이렇게 말했습니다:

sentences.original_text: The fourth animal shows that there will be a fourth kingdom
sentences.korean_translation: 네 번째 짐승은 네 번째 왕국이 있을 것을 보여줍니다

sentences.original_text: It will be different from all the other kingdoms.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 다른 모든 왕국들과 다를 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: It will use its power to destroy the whole earth.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 그 힘을 사용하여 온 땅을 파괴할 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: The person that I had asked told me this:
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 물었던 사람이 내게 이렇게 말했습니다:

sentences.original_text: The fourth animal shows that there will be a fourth kingdom
sentences.korean_translation: 네 번째 짐승은 네 번째 왕국이 있을 것을 보여줍니다

sentences.original_text: It will be different from all the other kingdoms.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 다른 모든 왕국들과 다를 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: It will use its power to destroy the whole earth.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 그 힘을 사용하여 온 땅을 파괴할 것입니다.
